en: Customer: Hello, I just bought a Godard Roux S.A. reader and I only have access to English books and prices in dollars, even though I'm in France. Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: This probably be because your billing information is not updated Customer: What should I do? Agent: 3 Agent: Click My Account near the top of the page Agent: 4 Agent: Click Account Settings Agent: 5 Agent: Click the Payment Information tab Agent: 6 Agent: Enter your credit card details under Payment Information, then click Save. Agent: 7 Agent: Enter your billing information under Billing Address, then click Save. Customer: Can I do this from my smartphone? Agent: Yes, and it is because you account doesn't have any address information  on your billing information ont the account Agent: You need to update your billing information in your account in order to see the books on store with the current language Customer: Ok I'm going to follow your advice and I'll see. en: Customer: Good morning, I ordered some books for a value of 52,91€. Customer: Here is the order number: URUKFR5COQ4. Customer: I thought I was buying paperback books and not digital ones as I do not own an eReader. Customer: I would therefore like to cancel my order and be reimbursed. Customer: I apologize for my mistake. Customer: Regards, Françoise Lambert. Customer: penelope31@louis.com Customer: On 29/12/1 Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: You were looking for a print book, correct? Customer: Yes I was. Agent: I understand, I apologize for the misunderstanding, but I'm going to help you. Customer: Thank you, so is it possible to cancel the order and get a refund? Agent: I want to share with you that the books you just purchased from Brun are a digital version called eBooks. Agent: Brun is a global retailer in eBooks, but does not sell print books. Agent: You can read a Brun eBook on many different devices including your computer, smart phone and eReader. Agent: If you wish to know how to do this, I will be more than happy to help you, If you do not wish to read the book digitally and prefer a refund, please let me know which option would you prefer. Customer: I prefer to get a refund. Agent: Of course! Agent: Since you were looking for the printed version of the book, I'm absolutely going to issue a refund for you. Agent: Would you prefer the refund back to your credit card or as store credit? Agent: Store credit can be used right away in your next purchase and will be used automatically during the checkout, the refund will take from 3 to 5 business days to be reflected back to your credit card. Customer: On my credit card please. Agent: Sure! Agent: I will escalate your case to our refunds department to process your refund, please wait to be contacted by our refunds team shortly for updates and confirmation of the refund. Agent: Meanwhile, is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: How will they contact me? Agent: You'll be contacted directly to the email that you registered for this interaction. Agent: Is this suitable for you? Agent: Are you still with me? Customer: Yes thank you very much, when? Agent: Since it depends on a different department, I can;t assure you this information. Agent: Turn on your eReader. Agent: On your eReader: Tap the language you want to set up your eReader in. Agent: Tap Don’t have a Wi Fi network?. Agent: Connect one end of the Micro USB cable to your eReader and the other end to a USB port on your computer. en: Customer: Can I use Lebrun to download books on Lebrun? Customer: jacques43@orange.fr Customer: none, I can't use it Agent: thanks for contacting us Agent: i will be happy to help Customer: thank you Agent: yes you can use Lebrun to transfer books to your Lebrun eReader Agent: this is the guide: Customer: on my reader's settings, under account, I get the following message: Not allowed with Lebrun Agent: have you tried to transfer a book with Lebrun? Customer: I downloaded version 3 of Lebrun and I can pull up the book that I borrowed on the app, but I can't transfer it to the reader, I'm still getting an error message that says I can't transfer it Customer: how do I allow Lebrun on Jean Vincent? Agent: in this case you can try unauthorize the computer and the eReader Agent: and delete the affected book from your downloads Agent: and then download the book again from the original source Agent: and reauthorize the ereader and the computer Agent: and try to transfer the book again Customer: I'll try it again Agent: perfect, I can wait if you want Customer: okay Customer: how do I cancel the permission? Agent: To deauthorize Lebrun, click Help > Erase Authorization. Agent: In the pop-up window that opens, enter the password for the account you used to authorize Lebrun. Agent: Click Erase Authorization. Customer: I don't have the Clear Permission option Customer: I have only authorized the computer, permission info and the Lebrun help Agent: then you can to deauthorize the eReader: Agent: Connect your ereader to your computer. Agent: Open Lebrun on your computer. Agent: Click on your ereader under "Devices." Agent: Select Device Options, then Erase Device Authorization. Agent: Click Erase Authorization to confirm Customer: How I do to change the id on Lebrun Agent: to use a new email address? Customer: yes Agent: in order to avoid future problems we suggest to use the same address linked to your Lebrun account for your Lebrun ID, however, if you want to change the email address you can create a new Lebrun account with the email address that you want Customer: how do I change the ID address which is there by default on Lebrun? fr: Client: Bonjour, Client: J'ai un problème récurrent quant au téléchargement de livres de la bibliothèque sur ma liseuse. Client: En effet, quand je les télécharge et les glisse dans le fichier de ma liseuse, après avoir ouvert ma liseuse, je vois le fichier téléchargém mais il est noir et je ne peux pas l'ouvrir. Client: Et j'ai beau désautoriser ma liseuse et l'autoriser à nouveau, retélécharger le document, rien ne fonctionne. Client: Bien spur! Client: nicolas64@ferreira.net Agent: Merci pour ces informations. Agent: Je serai plus que ravi de vous aider. Client: Mon dernier achat est Seriously... I'm kidding Client: Dufour Agent: Dufour est une application tierce (de Dufour et non de Dufour) mais nous pouvons recommander quelques étapes pour essayer de corriger cela, comme conseillé par la source (Dufour) Agent: Tout d'abord, réinitialisez l'autorisation sur votre Dufour Agent: Assurez-vous que les paramètres de date et d'heure de votre liseuse Dufour sont corrects. Agent: Vous devriez les trouver dans le menu Paramètres de votre Dufour. Agent: Branchez votre Dufour sur votre ordinateur (en utilisant le câble USB fourni avec votre Dufour). Agent: Ouvrez Dufour sur votre ordinateur. Agent: Utilisez Dufour pour supprimer le livre électronique qui cause des problèmes de votre Dufour et de votre ordinateur (assurez-vous de choisir l'option Supprimer de la bibliothèque). Agent: Cliquez sur votre Dufour dans le menu « Périphériques » sur la gauche. Agent: Cliquez sur l'icône d'engrenage des paramètres du périphérique à côté de « Périphériques », puis sélectionnez Effacer l'autorisation de périphérique. Agent: Cliquez sur Effacer l'autorisation, puis OK pour confirmer. Agent: Essayez de réinitialiser l'autorisation dans Dufour Agent: Dans Dufour, appuyez sur Ctrl + Maj + D (Commande + Maj + D sur un Mac) sur votre clavier. Agent: Dans la fenêtre contextuelle qui s'ouvre, entrez le mot de passe de votre identifiant Dufour ou compte Dufour (et assurez-vous que le bon identifiant Dufour figure dans le menu déroulant). Agent: Ensuite, Cliquez sur Continuer. Agent: Sélectionnez Effacer l'autorisation, puis OK. Agent: Autorisez à nouveau votre ordinateur en allant dans Aide > Autoriser l'ordinateur. Agent: Remarque : Assurez-vous de réautoriser votre ordinateur en utilisant le même identifiant Dufour qu'auparavant. Agent: Sinon, vous ne pourrez pas télécharger à nouveau votre livre électronique. Agent: Essayez à nouveau de transférer le livre électronique Agent: Téléchargez à nouveau le livre électronique qui causait des problèmes Agent: Transférez le livre électronique de Dufour vers votre Dufour Agent: Cette étape autorisera également votre Dufour. Agent: Essayez d'ouvrir le titre sur votre Dufour. Agent: Notez que si vous avez installé la version Dufour, cela peut être la source du problème. Agent: Malheureusement, Dufour fonctionne mal avec certains livres qui sont au format Dufour au moment du transfert à la liseuse. Agent: Dufour modifie très légèrement le code de verrouillage numérique (Dufour), et ce changement n'est pas reconnu par Dufour. Agent: Le format Dufour est une norme largement utilisée, mais Dufour semble ne pouvoir traiter que des livres au format Dufour. Agent: C'est pourquoi avec Dufour certains livres sont transférables et d'autres non. Client: Oui j'essaie de faire ce que vous m'avez dit
en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I have a recurring problem with downloading books from the library on my e-reader. Customer: In fact, when I download and drag them into the file of my reader, after opening my reader, I see the downloaded file but it is black and I cannot open it. Customer: And no matter how hard I try to de-authorize my e-reader and re-authorize it, re-download the document, nothing works. Customer: Of course! Customer: nicolas64@ferreira.net Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Customer: My last purchase is Seriously... I'm kidding. Customer: Dufour Agent: Dufour is a third party app (from Dufour not Dufour) however we can recommend afew steps to try to correct this as advised by the source (Dufour) Agent: First, reset the authorization on your Dufour Agent: Make sure the date and time settings on your Dufour eReader are correct. Agent: You should find these in the Settings menu on your Dufour. Agent: Plug your Dufour into your computer (using the USB cable that came with your Dufour). Agent: Open Dufour on your computer. Agent: Use Dufour to delete the eBook that's causing issues from your Dufour and your computer (make sure to choose the Remove from Library option). Agent: Click on your Dufour under the "Devices" menu on the left. Agent: Click device options gear icon next to "Devices," then select Erase Device Authorization. Agent: Click Erase Authorization, then OK to confirm. Agent: Try to reset the authorization in Dufour Agent: In Dufour, press Ctrl + Shift + D (Command + Shift + D on a Mac) on your keyboard. Agent: In the pop-up window that opens, enter the password for your Dufour ID or Dufour account (and make sure the correct Dufour ID is listed in the drop-down menu). Agent: Then, click Continue. Agent: Select Erase Authorization, then OK. Agent: Authorize your computer again by going to Help > Authorize Computer. Agent: Note: Make sure to reauthorize your computer using the same Dufour ID as before. Agent: Otherwise, you won't be able to re-download your eBook Agent: Try transferring the eBook again Agent: Re-download the eBook that was causing issues Agent: Transfer the eBook from Dufour to your Dufour. Agent: This step will also reauthorize your Dufour. Agent: Try opening the title on your Dufour. Agent: Note that if you have installed the version Dufour, this may be the source of the problem. Agent: Unfortunately, Dufour malfunctions with certain books which are in Dufour format at the time of transfer to the reader. Agent: Dufour very slightly changes the digital lock code (Dufour), and this change is not recognized by Dufour. Agent: The Dufour format is a widely used standard, but Dufour seems to only be able to process books in the Dufour format. Agent: This is why with Dufour some books are transferable and others are not. Customer: Yes I'm trying to do what you told me.

en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I have a free Rossi S.A. file on my Rossi S.A. phone. Customer: I would like to import it to my Rossi S.A. account but I don't see how to do it. Customer: Can you please tell me what I need to do? Customer: Thank you for your response. Customer: obegue@orange.fr Customer: The Rossi S.A. Customer: Can you answer my question please??? Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Nice to meet you, Cécile Gautier. Agent: I hope you are having a great day! Agent: I apologize but I'm unable to verify your account with the eBook title provided. Agent: Please provide me with an eBook purchased through your account. Customer: I feel like I am in an interrogation while I just want to know how to import a file! Customer: The portrait of Dorian Grey? Agent: You are not able to transfer an Rossi S.A. file from your android to your eReader. Agent: The file needs to be on your computer to be able to transfer it. Customer: Ok, and from my computer, can I import it to my Rossi S.A. account? Agent: You can only import it to your Rossi S.A.. Customer: Via USB cable? Customer: I can't import it to my account then sync it with the e-reader? Agent: No, as mentioned above and it can only be transferred to your Rossi S.A.. Agent: To add a non-protected Rossi S.A. or Rossi S.A. file to your eReader: Agent: Turn on your eReader. Agent: Connect the micro USB cable to your eReader and to your computer. Agent: On your eReader, tap Connect when you see the 'Computer detected' window. Agent: On your computer, look for a drive named 'Rossi S.A.'. Agent: Drag the Rossi S.A. or Rossi S.A. files into the 'Rossi S.A. eReader' drive. Agent: Eject your eReader: Agent: Right-click on the 'Rossi S.A.' drive on your computer's desktop and click Eject. Agent: Unplug the USB cable from your eReader. Agent: You'll see a "Importing content" message on your eReader. Agent: To find the file you just added on your eReader: Agent: Go to your Home screen. Agent: Tap My Books at the bottom of the screen. Agent: Tap the name of the book you added to start reading. Customer: OK, thanks. Agent: Thank you for choosing us. Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with? Customer: It's really a pity not to be able to import it to the account... Agent: Our Rossi S.A. e-readers and our Rossi S.A. applications are constantly improved through the opinions, suggestions, requests and comments of our customers Agent: To make sure your suggestion is forwarded to our innovation-minded development team please reach us by Agent: Website: Agent: - Go to http://thomas.com/ Agent: - On your left, click on the Feedback tab Agent: - Click on General feedback Agent: Is there anything else I can help you with?

en: Customer: Hello, Customer: I just bought the first volume of the Laroche series, but I just realized that my reader is no longer working. Customer: Can I have a refund for the ebook? Customer: Thank you, Agent: Thank you for contacting Laroche, can you please provide the email address of your Laroche account? Customer: matthieudelannoy@club-internet.fr Agent: For security purposes, can you please confirm either the date of your most recent purchase or the title of one of the ebooks/audiobooks in your account? Customer: January 3 816496 Agent: Thank you for the information. Agent: I will be more than happy to assist you. Agent: Nice to met you, Martine Gauthier. Agent: I hope you are having a great day! Agent: Please, allow me a few minutes to find your account. Customer: Thank you very much Agent: Thank you for your patience! Agent: I was able to find your account and I can see the eBook you purchased. Agent: I am sorry to know about this situation with your eBook and the eReader. Agent: But don't worry! Agent: Due to I can see the eBook was purchased today, we can still process a refund with no problems! Agent: However, in case you wish to keep the eBook, it could also be possible to read it using our free Laroche. Agent: If you are interested on them, you can download the Apps from here: Customer: Thank you, but I prefer a refund Agent: No problem, I can understand it! Agent: Please, allow me a moment to check if I can process the refund to your credit card at this moment. Agent: Thank you for your patience! Agent: I tried to process the refund at the moment, but it seems the purchase has not been processed by our payment provider yet, which usually takes a minimum of 2 hours. Agent: But don't worry! Agent: Note: If you don't see the 'Powered off' screen, go to the next step. Agent: Press and hold one of the page turn buttons. Agent: While holding the page turn button, press and hold the power button. Agent: Wait until the screen flashes and starts the reset process. Agent: It usually takes about 30-seconds for the eReader to start the reset process. Agent: Set up your eReader Customer: As I explained earlier, I did, but I don't think you read what I wrote. Agent: Ok. Agent: In this case you return it to the store which the fast way. Customer: Ok I'll go there. Customer: But how does it work? Customer: Will he replace it? Agent: I don't know their terms and conditions but  you can ask them. Agent: But must of the time they have store warranty because is a brand new device. Customer: Ok I'm going to go there. Customer: I will admit that I am very disappointed, Customer: this is a gift for my wife. Agent: I apologized for the inconvenience, Thank you for contacting Hoarau S.A., have a nice day. Agent: Goodbye.
